ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Tunnel Rat, Torpedo & Alpine save Bombstrike from the Red Shadows with Leila's help; Leila returns to Olliestan, inspired by Bombstrike's heroism. Ace bombs Red Laser's Blue Ninjas and Stalker, Zap and Storm Shadow take Red Laser prisoner. Zartan continues his pursuit of Dawn.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 17:39:13. [CVDB578183] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:37:49. [Issue ID 1670388]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,John Royale,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Alpine,Bombstrike,Zap,G.I. Joe [Tunnel Rat,Red Shadows [Black Major,Ace],Felipe,Storm Shadow,Leila,Blue Ninjas,Zartan,Torpedo,Stalker,Red Laser]
